department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: Translation Services for General Dept. (English-French) from sensitive nature.
description: Translation Services for General Dept. (English-French) from sensitive nature. with a volume of 6 million words
full_summary:
### Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)

#### Reference:

- **Reference Number**: PW-__ZF-511-41254 (EP745-231624/A)
- **Amendment Number**: 3
- **Publication Date**: December 8, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date**: December 19, 2022, at 02:00:00 PM (Eastern Standard Time)

#### About the Procurement:

This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) for Translation Services from English to French, covering the domain of General and Administrative Texts. The bid solicitation is for a Supply Arrangement (SA) EP745-230361, administered by the Translation Bureau. The RFP is limited to suppliers pre-qualified in the Tier 3 - field of General and Administrative Texts, from English to French, in accordance with the conditions of SA EP745-230361.

#### Details of the Procurement:

- **Scope of Work**: Translation services of up to 6,000,000 words distributed as follows: 3,000,000 words for the initial two-year period and up to 1,500,000 words over each of the two one-year irrevocable options to extend the contract.
- **Volume and Distribution**: The volume and distribution are specified in the bid solicitation documents.

#### Eligible Suppliers:

- Suppliers on the permanent list or able to meet the qualification requirements based on the conditions of SA EP745-230361.

#### Procedure:

- Suppliers who are pre-qualified and invited to submit a bid will receive the bid solicitation documents by e-mail directly from the Contracting Officer.
- Inquiries regarding this bid solicitation must be submitted to the Contracting Authority at TPSGC.PADDSBT-APRFPTB.PWGSC@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

#### Important Notes:
- The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
- Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.  The deadline for submitting bids is December 19, 2022, at 02:00:00 PM (Eastern Standard Time).
- A complete list of documents and bid solicitation information, including contact details, is available on the CanadaBuys website.
